cause.description:
We've all been there before, it happens to the best of us, someone agreed to meet us up somewhere, sometime, to do something and then left you waiting there feeling like the biggest idiot...you can
a) Get Crunk! And tell strangers personal things
b) Keep your cool and do the event by yourself, looking like a loner and an idiot in doing so
c) Call up other people last minute and risk sounding like the world's neediest most desperate human soul~
or you could
d) Join this cause to end "I got stood up last night" once and for all!!!111!!11
1. Dating is a drain on money and time
2. Dating should be fun
3. Being stood up on a date is a waste of money, time and it is NOT fun
cause.mission: Stop the deplorable behavior in the dating world known as being "stood up".
cause.name: Help! I got stood up!
